name: This hell is too small for us all
name_original: This hell is too small for us all
description:
This Hell is too small for more than one demon, so throw the rest to the fire pit!

Unleash the power of a single key with this party-arena-deathmatch-local-multiplayer game for 2-6 players!

We made this game for the 38th Ludum Dare. This time we decided with a small idea and growing from there.

https://itch.io/embed-upload/456557?color=d1520e

Controls:

At the beginning of the game, every player chooses a button.

Once at least, two players have made their choice, any player can hold its button to start playing.

While in the arena, press your key to turn right. Press it twice to turn left.

Don't fall.
